terminals.command: while true; do echo '=== PostgreSQL Check ===' && brew services list | grep postgresql && echo '=== Backend Health ===' && curl -s http://localhost:3002/health && echo '=== SuperApp Health ===' && curl -s -I http://localhost:3001 && echo '=== Process Monitor ===' && ps aux | grep -E '(vite|npm run dev)' | grep -v grep | wc -l && echo 'Active processes detected ^' && echo '' && sleep 30; done
